Bike Tour Copenhagen

Bike Copenhagen like a local

Bike Tour

Your local mentor:

Kristian

About:

Kristian is a Copenhagen based entrepreneur, running his own business Tours In Copenhagen where he shows visitors around Copenhagen and Zealand. He is passionate about food and people and he loves his city, where he has lived for more than 10 years. Originally hailing from the Northen Jutland countryside, Kristian now calls Copenhagen home. He's living with his family in Nørrebro.

Course Details:

Location: Copenhagen, Denmark

Duration: 1 full day, 8 hours in total including, lunch and coffee.

Level: Beginner/All Levels

Price: $275 USD per person

What you'll learn:

Learn how to bike around Copenhagen like only the locals know.

Where we'll be:

Nørrebro, Copenhagen

What I'll provide:

You will learn all my favorite spots in and around Copenhagen.

Good to know

Wear warm clothes and shoes suitable for biking, it might get chilly in the evening, even though it's summer.

Where we'll meet:

Nørrebro, Copenhagen
